Uses of Class
sawtooth.sdk.processor.exceptions.ValidatorConnectionError

  • Packages that use ValidatorConnectionError 
    Package Description
    sawtooth.sdk.messaging
    Used within the SDK to provide connection and message passing with the validator.

    • Uses of ValidatorConnectionError in sawtooth.sdk.messaging

      Methods in sawtooth.sdk.messaging that throw ValidatorConnectionError 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      com.google.protobuf.ByteString Future.getResult()
      Block until the result is ready.
      com.google.protobuf.ByteString Future.getResult​(long timeout)
      Block until timeout, then throw TimeoutException if result is not available.
      com.google.protobuf.ByteString FutureError.getResult()
      Always raises ValidatorConnectionError.

      Always raises ValidatorConnectionError.
      boolean Future.isDone()
      The future is available.

      Always raises ValidatorConnectionError.

      Set the result of the Future.
